texts.label: DecorDesc_SMALL_DESK
texts.zh: 为一个人建造的\n一张小桌子.
texts.en: A small desk built\nfor one.

texts.label: DecorDesc_POKEMON_DESK
texts.zh: 一张精灵球\n形状的小桌子.
texts.en: A small desk built in\nthe shape of a POKé\nBALL.

texts.label: DecorDesc_HEAVY_DESK
texts.zh: 一张钢制的大桌子。\n可以在上面放一些\n装饰品.
texts.en: A large desk made\nof steel. Put some\ndecorations on it.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RAGGED_DESK
texts.zh: 一张木制的大桌子.\n可以在上面放一些\n装饰品.
texts.en: A large desk made\nof wood. Put some\ndecorations on it.

texts.label: DecorDesc_COMFORT_DESK
texts.zh: 一张叶子制成的大\n桌子.可以在上面放一些\n装饰品.
texts.en: A large desk made\nof leaves. Put some\ndecorations on it.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PRETTY_DESK
texts.zh: 一张巨大的玻璃书桌。\n有许多装饰品.
texts.en: A huge desk made\nof glass. Holds lots\nof decorations.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BRICK_DESK
texts.zh: 一张巨大的砖砌桌子。\n拥有许多装饰品.
texts.en: A huge desk made\nof brick. Holds lots\nof decorations.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CAMP_DESK
texts.zh: 一张由原木制成的\n巨大办公桌。\n在上面放很多装饰品.
texts.en: A huge desk made\nof logs. Put lots of\ndecorations on it.

texts.label: DecorDesc_HARD_DESK
texts.zh: 一张巨大的石桌。\n拥有许多装饰品.
texts.en: A huge desk made\nof rocks. Holds\nmany decorations.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SMALL_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一个人用的\n小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nfor one.

texts.label: DecorDesc_POKEMON_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一个小椅子，\n形状像精灵球.
texts.en: A small chair built\nin the shape of a\nPOKé BALL.

texts.label: DecorDesc_HEAVY_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一张钢制小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof steel.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PRETTY_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一张用青草\n制作的椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof glass.

texts.label: DecorDesc_COMFORT_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一张用叶子\n制作的椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof leaves.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RAGGED_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一张木制\n小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof wood.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BRICK_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一把砖砌的\n小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof brick.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CAMP_CHAIR
texts.zh: 原木做的\n小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof logs.

texts.label: DecorDesc_HARD_CHAIR
texts.zh: 一把石头做的\n小椅子.
texts.en: A small chair made\nof rock.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RED_PLANT
texts.zh: 种着鲜红花朵\n的盆栽.
texts.en: A vivid red potted\nplant.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TROPICAL_PLANT
texts.zh: 种着南国花朵\n的盆栽.
texts.en: A flowering tropical\nplant in a pot.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PRETTY_FLOWERS
texts.zh: 一盆可爱的花.
texts.en: A pot of cute\nflowers.

texts.label: DecorDesc_COLORFUL_PLANT
texts.zh: 栽着各式\n各样花朵\n的大型盆栽.
texts.en: A large pot with\nmany colorful\nflowers.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BIG_PLANT
texts.zh: 像雨伞般树木\n的大型盆栽.
texts.en: A large, umbrella-\nshaped plant in a\nbig pot.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GORGEOUS_PLANT
texts.zh: 令人印象深刻的\n华丽盆栽.
texts.en: A large, impressive\nplant in a big pot.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RED_BRICK
texts.zh: 红色的砖块，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A red-colored brick.\nDecorations can be\nplaced on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_YELLOW_BRICK
texts.zh: 黄色的砖块，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A yellow-colored\nbrick. Put some\ndecorations on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BLUE_BRICK
texts.zh: 蓝色的砖块，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A blue-colored\nbrick. Put some\ndecorations on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RED_BALLOON
texts.zh: 装有水的红色\n气球，踩上去\n就会破掉.
texts.en: A red balloon filled\nwith water. Bursts\nif stepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BLUE_BALLOON
texts.zh: 装有水的蓝色\n气球，踩上去\n就会破掉.
texts.en: A blue balloon filled\nwith water. Bursts\nif stepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_YELLOW_BALLOON
texts.zh: 装有水的黄色\n气球，踩上去\n就会破掉.
texts.en: A yellow balloon\nfilled with water.\nPops if stepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RED_TENT
texts.zh: 大型的红色\n帐篷，可以进入\n里面.
texts.en: A large red tent.\nYou can hide inside\nit.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BLUE_TENT
texts.zh: 大型的蓝色\n账篷，可以进入\n里面.
texts.en: A large blue tent.\nYou can hide inside\nit.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SOLID_BOARD
texts.zh: 放在洞穴的上方\n的话就可以\n走到对面去.
texts.en: Place over a hole to\ncross to the other\nside.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SLIDE
texts.zh: 从台子上方\n可以滑下来.
texts.en: Use to slide down\nfrom the platform.

texts.label: DecorDesc_FENCE_LENGTH
texts.zh: 小型的栅栏，\n无法加以通过.
texts.en: A small fence that\nblocks passage.

texts.label: DecorDesc_FENCE_WIDTH
texts.zh: 小型的栅栏，\n无法加以通过.
texts.en: A small fence that\nblocks passage.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TIRE
texts.zh: 老旧的大型轮胎，\n上面可放置\n东西.
texts.en: An old large tire.\nDecorations can be\nplaced on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_STAND
texts.zh: 一个带台阶的\n大基座.
texts.en: A large pedestal\nwith steps.

texts.label: DecorDesc_MUD_BALL
texts.zh: 圆形的泥巴丸子，\n一踩上去就会\n破掉.
texts.en: A large ball of mud.\nCrumbles if stepped\non.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BREAKABLE_DOOR
texts.zh: 可以穿越\n通过的奇怪\n门板.
texts.en: A weird door that\npeople can walk\nright through.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SAND_ORNAMENT
texts.zh: 一碰触就会\n崩塌的摆饰\n物品.
texts.en: An ornament made\nof sand. Crumbles if\ntouched.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SILVER_SHIELD
texts.zh: 在对战塔战胜\n50人的纪念\n奖牌.
texts.en: Awarded for 50\nstraight wins at\nthe BATTLE TOWER.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GOLD_SHIELD
texts.zh: 在对战塔战胜\n100人的纪念\n奖牌.
texts.en: Awarded for 100\nstraight wins at\nthe BATTLE TOWER.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GLASS_ORNAMENT
texts.zh: 以玻璃依照美术馆\n里的知名雕刻模仿\n制作而成的东西.
texts.en: A glass replica of\na famous sculpture\nat the ART MUSEUM.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TV
texts.zh: 灰色的小型\n玩具电视机.
texts.en: A small, gray-\ncolored toy TV.

texts.label: DecorDesc_ROUND_TV
texts.zh: 以橡实果的\n样子所制作的\n玩具电视机.
texts.en: A toy TV modeled\nin the image of a\nSEEDOT.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CUTE_TV
texts.zh: 以向尾喵的\n样子所制作的\n玩具电视机.
texts.en: A toy TV modeled\nin the image of a\nSKITTY.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GLITTER_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去之后\n会闪亮亮的神奇\n地毯.
texts.en: An odd mat that\nglitters if stepped\non.

texts.label: DecorDesc_JUMP_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去之后\n会跳跃的恶作剧\n地毯.
texts.en: A trick mat that\njumps when it is\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SPIN_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去之后\n会跳跃的恶作剧\n地毯.
texts.en: A trick mat that\nspins around when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_C_LOW_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出低音\n“Do”声的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\na low C note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_D_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“Re”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\na D note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_E_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“Mi”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\nan E note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_F_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“Fa”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\nan F note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_G_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“So”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\na G note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_A_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“La”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\nan A note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_B_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出“Ti”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\na B note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_C_HIGH_NOTE_MAT
texts.zh: 踩上去后\n会发出高音“Do”声\n的地毯.
texts.en: A mat that plays\na high C note when\nstepped on.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SURF_MAT
texts.zh: 以冲浪形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\na SURF image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_THUNDER_MAT
texts.zh: 以打雷形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\na THUNDER image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_FIRE_BLAST_MAT
texts.zh: 以大字爆炎\n形象制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\na FIRE BLAST image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_POWDER_SNOW_MAT
texts.zh: 以细雪形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat with a POWDER\nSNOW image design.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_ATTRACT_MAT
texts.zh: 以迷人形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\nan ATTRACT image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_FISSURE_MAT
texts.zh: 以地裂形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\na FISSURE image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SPIKES_MAT
texts.zh: 以撒菱形象\n制作的地毯，\n上面可放置东西.
texts.en: A mat designed with\na SPIKES image.\nPut items on top.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BALL_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有精灵球的\n小张海报.
texts.en: A small poster\nprinted with POKé\nBALLS.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GREEN_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有木守宫的\n小张海报.
texts.en: A small poster with\na TREECKO print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RED_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有火稚鸡的\n小张海报.
texts.en: A small poster with\na TORCHIC print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BLUE_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有水跃鱼的\n小张海报.
texts.en: A small poster with\na MUDKIP print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CUTE_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有露力丽的\n小张海报.
texts.en: A small poster with\nan AZURILL print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PIKA_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有皮卡丘和皮丘\n的大张海报.
texts.en: A large poster with\na PIKACHU and\nPICHU print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_LONG_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有饭匙蛇的\n大张海报.
texts.en: A large poster with\na SEVIPER print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SEA_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有古空棘鱼的\n大张海报.
texts.en: A large poster with\na RELICANTH print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SKY_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有长翅鸥的\n大张海报.
texts.en: A large poster with\na WINGULL print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_KISS_POSTER
texts.zh: 印有迷唇娃的\n大张海报.
texts.en: A large poster with\na SMOOCHUM print.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PICHU_DOLL
texts.zh: 皮丘的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A PICHU doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PIKACHU_DOLL
texts.zh: 皮卡丘的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A PIKACHU doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_MARILL_DOLL
texts.zh: 玛力露的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A MARILL doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TOGEPI_DOLL
texts.zh: 波克比的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A TOGEPI doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CYNDAQUIL_DOLL
texts.zh: 火球鼠的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A CYNDAQUIL doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CHIKORITA_DOLL
texts.zh: 菊草叶的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A CHIKORITA doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TOTODILE_DOLL
texts.zh: 小锯鳄的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A TOTODILE doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_JIGGLYPUFF_DOLL
texts.zh: 胖丁的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A JIGGLYPUFF doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_MEOWTH_DOLL
texts.zh: 喵喵的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A MEOWTH doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_CLEFAIRY_DOLL
texts.zh: 皮皮的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A CLEFAIRY doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_DITTO_DOLL
texts.zh: 百变怪的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A DITTO doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SMOOCHUM_DOLL
texts.zh: 迷唇娃的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SMOOCHUM doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TREECKO_DOLL
texts.zh: 木守宫的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A TREECKO doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_TORCHIC_DOLL
texts.zh: 火稚鸡的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A TORCHIC doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_MUDKIP_DOLL
texts.zh: 水跃鱼的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A MUDKIP doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_DUSKULL_DOLL
texts.zh: 夜巡灵的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A DUSKULL doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_WYNAUT_DOLL
texts.zh: 小果然的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A WYNAUT doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BALTOY_DOLL
texts.zh: 天秤偶的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A BALTOY doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_KECLEON_DOLL
texts.zh: 变隐龙的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A KECLEON doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_AZURILL_DOLL
texts.zh: 露力丽的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: An AZURILL doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SKITTY_DOLL
texts.zh: 向尾喵的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SKITTY doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SWABLU_DOLL
texts.zh: 青绵鸟的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SWABLU doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GULPIN_DOLL
texts.zh: 溶食兽的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A GULPIN doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_LOTAD_DOLL
texts.zh: 莲叶童子的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A LOTAD doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SEEDOT_DOLL
texts.zh: 橡实果的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SEEDOT doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_PIKA_CUSHION
texts.zh: 皮卡丘的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A PIKACHU cushion.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_ROUND_CUSHION
texts.zh: 玛力露丽的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A MARILL cushion.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_KISS_CUSHION
texts.zh: 迷唇娃的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和桌子\n上.
texts.en: A SMOOCHUM\ncushion. Place it on\na mat or a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_ZIGZAG_CUSHION
texts.zh: 蛇纹熊的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A ZIGZAGOON\ncushion. Place it on\na mat or a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SPIN_CUSHION
texts.zh: 晃晃斑的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SPINDA cushion.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_DIAMOND_CUSHION
texts.zh: 勾魂眼的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A SABLEYE cushion.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_BALL_CUSHION
texts.zh: 精灵球的垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A BALL cushion.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_GRASS_CUSHION
texts.zh: 草标志垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A grass-mark\ncushion. Place it on\na mat or a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_FIRE_CUSHION
texts.zh: 火标志垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A fire-mark\ncushion. Place it on\na mat or a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_WATER_CUSHION
texts.zh: 水标志垫子，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A water-mark\ncushion. Place it on\na mat or a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_SNORLAX_DOLL
texts.zh: 巨大的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A large doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_RHYDON_DOLL
texts.zh: 巨大的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A large doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.

texts.label: DecorDesc_LAPRAS_DOLL
texts.zh: 巨大的布偶，\n要放置在地毯和\n桌子上.
texts.en: A large doll.\nPlace it on a mat\nor a desk.
